description: Willow Bell (Campanula persicifolia 'Telham Beauty') is an amazing plant species because of its stunning, bell-shaped pastel blue and white flowers, luscious green foliage, and easy-care requirements. Its flower clusters are especially eye-catching, adding an abundance of colour to the garden throughout the summer. Its tolerance of hot and humid climates make this plant ideal for a wide variety of gardeners looking to add colour and vibrancy to the garden. Its plush green foliage looks fantastic when planted as a border plant and its low maintenance requirements make its upkeep a breeze. An all-round plant perfect for experienced and novice gardeners alike.
